mapper.insert: insert into customers (id, username, password, account_type, name, city_id, types, last_logined_at, integral, status, device_code, created_at, updated_at, phone, email ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{types,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastLoginedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update customers set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=BIT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, types = #{types,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_logined_at = #{lastLoginedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, account_type, name, city_id, types, last_logined_at, integral, status, device_code, created_at, updated_at, phone, email from customers where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, password, account_type, name, city_id, types, last_logined_at, integral, status, device_code, created_at, updated_at, phone, email from customers

select id, username, password, account_type, name, city_id, types, last_logined_at, integral, status, device_code, created_at, updated_at, phone, email from customers where username=#{param1} and password=#{param2} and status=#{NORMAL}
